
The Retina-V1 model is coded in the function retina_V1_model. 

See (or run) retina_V1_model_inputs for an example on how to call retina_V1_model with example inputs.

A custom ganglion cell mosaic can be created with the function create_GC_mosaic. A default ganglion cell mosaic is 
provided in GC_mosaic

background_1f and background_natural are example 1/f noise and natural backgrounds, respectively.

The folder ModelFest Stimuli contains the 43 target stimuli used by the ModelFest group.
